publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7631 Des McNulty: Zero-hours Contracts—That the Parliament expresses concern regarding the use of zero-hours contracts by Amazon and contract staff being sent home in the middle of the night; believes that these practices are Dickensian and have no place in a modern society, and calls on Amazon to treat all its workforce fairly.
S3M-7631 Zero-hours Contracts (lodged on 20 December 2010) Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-7631 Des McNulty: Zero-hours Contracts—That the Parliament expresses concern regarding the use of zero-hours contracts by Amazon and contract staff being sent home in the middle of the night; believes that these practices are Dickensian and have no place in a modern society, and calls on Amazon to treat all its workforce fairly. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn
